results.title: A Case of Reversible Atrioventricular Block Potentially Associated with Atenolol-Induced Hyperkalemia
results.text_hl: This case report describes an @DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@end-stage renal disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@ESRD@@@) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ who presented with @DISEASE_Hyperkalemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006947 @@@hyperkalemia@@@ and type @<m>DISEASE_Oculocutaneous_albinism_type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537730 @@@II@@@ second degree @DISEASE_Atrioventricular_Block @DISEASE_MESH:D054537 @@@atrioventricular (AV) block@@@.

citations.NLM: Oo KT, Yee HW. A Case of Reversible Atrioventricular Block Potentially Associated with Atenolol-Induced Hyperkalemia Cureus. 2021 Feb 5;13(2):e13151. PMID: 33692921
citations.BibTeX: @article{33692921, title={A Case of Reversible Atrioventricular Block Potentially Associated with Atenolol-Induced Hyperkalemia}, author={Oo KT and Yee HW}, journal={Cureus}, volume={13}, number={2}, pages={e13151}}

results.title: [Effects of calcium antagonists or beta-blockade on left ventricular diastolic function in essential hypertension].
results.text_hl: This study was performed to assess the effect of a @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ channel blocker (@CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@) and beta-blockade (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@) on left ventricular early diastolic function and filling in @DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@ (@DISEASE_Prodromal_Symptoms @DISEASE_MESH:D062706 @@@WHO stage I@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Oculocutaneous_albinism_type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537730 @@@II@@@; @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@HT@@@).

citations.NLM: Shiotani M, Arita M, Nakatsu C, Nakamura N, Ohshika H, Nakamura Y, Fujiwara S, Ueno Y, Nishio I, Masuyama Y. [Effects of calcium antagonists or beta-blockade on left ventricular diastolic function in essential hypertension]. J Cardiol. 1990;20(1):135-45. PMID: 2093746
